content.question: (a) How is the critic of this activity characterized by Cicero in lines 1-2 (est ille . . . possum)? (b) According to Cicero, what two things does the critic shun in lines 2-3 (sed abhorret . . . concessis)? Refer specifically to the Latin to support your answer.

frqParts.text: (a) How is the critic of this activity characterized by Cicero in lines 1-2 (est ille . . . possum)? (b) According to Cicero, what two things does the critic shun in lines 2-3 (sed abhorret . . . concessis)? Refer specifically to the Latin to support your answer.
